Translations.Text: eheyin ada dina ohuta mehi kisidu samipa mitureku næta
mage (tuvalavala) særava misa venat kisidu aharayak da næta
væradi kalavun misa eya kisivaku anubhava nokarayi
numbala dakina dæ mata da mama divurami
numbala nodakina dæ mata da mama divurami
niyata vasayenma meya gauravaniya dutayakuge prakasayaki
tavada eya kaviyakuge prakasayak da noveyi. numbala visvasa karanuye svalpayaki
eya huniyamkaruvakuge prakasayak da noveyi. numbala menehi karanne svalpayaki
(eya) sakala lokayange paramadhipatigen pahala karanu læbuvaki
prabandhayan samaharak apa veta ohu gota pævasuve nam
api ohu va dakunatin hasukara gannemu
pasu va prana nalaya ohugen api kapa harinnemu
evita numbala aturin kisiveku ho (apagen) ohuva valakvannan lesa nositiyi
tavada niyata vasayenma eya biya bætimatunhata menehi kirimaki
niyata vasayenma numbala aturin musavadin sitina bava sæbævinma api danimu
tavada niyata vasayenma eya deva pratiksepakayinhata balavat sokayaki
tavada niyata vasayenma eya sthira satyayaki
eheyin numbage sarva baladhari paramadhipatige namayen suvisuddha karanu
sidu vana danduvamak pilibanda vimasanneku vimasuveya
deva pratiksepakayinhata eya valakvana kisiveku ho nomæta
(ema danduvama) usasthana himi allahgen (siduveyi)
ehi kala pramanaya vasara panas dahasak vana dinayaka malakvarunda, atmayada (jibril da) ohu (allah) veta arohanaya veti
eheyin oba alamkara ayurin ivasa dara ganu
niyata vasayenma eya (danduvama) adhika durin æti bava ovuhu sitati
namut api eya samipayen dakimu
edina ahasa unu vu tamba men vanu æta
tavada kandu lom men vanu æta
miturek mitureku gæna prasna nokarayi
